comments.body: Sorry for not catching this. We parametrize the same field in kube-dns service because it needs to fall into the service subnet. This may not work if people are not using the default service subnet. I think we can defer the fix for a follow up though.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +8,12 @@  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  clusterIP: 10.0.0.17
  ports:
    - port: 6666
